SummaryEnglish: For a lonely orphan, there is almost only one career path to success. That is to get a national qualification as an alchemist. After graduating from the Royal Alchemist Training Academy, which requires nothing but ability, Sarasa is presented with the rights to a store by her master. After being sent off by her generous mentor, Sarasa sets off on her journey, dreaming of a slightly elegant life as an alchemist, but upon arrival, she is shocked to find that the countryside is even more rural than she had imagined. However, even in such a place, she has to manage a store somehow to make a living.

1.SummaryEnglish: Life dealt Sarasa a bad hand, but she'll turn metaphorical lead into literal gold by passing her final alchemy exam. Highlife, here she comes! But there's just one problem...

2.SummaryEnglish: Her new digs may look shabby, but there’s more to them than meets the eye. With hard work (and a little help) Sarasa will transform her situation in no time flat!

3.SummaryEnglish: Sarasa’s skills come in handy when some gatherers run afoul of a monster, but not everyone understands that in alchemy and finance alike, there must be equivalent exchange.

4.SummaryEnglish: Sarasa needs some assistance running her business after recent excitement left her feeling drained. Luckily she knows exactly who to ask for help!

5.SummaryEnglish: Sarasa needs frostfang bat fangs, but that requires hunting them in the cave systems they live in.

6.SummaryEnglish: A monster that could drop a rare ingredient, AND Sarasa could enjoy a trip to the lake in the bargain? Sign her up for a monster hunt!

7.SummaryEnglish: Sarasa’s powers go haywire when her pendant breaks! Running the shop is tough without it, but duty calls — much to her (and her customers’) chagrin.

8.SummaryEnglish: It’s normal to have a competitor; it’s just business. But when Sarasa learns her new rival is scheming with bandits? Things just got personal.

9.SummaryEnglish: Iris and Kate have a dept to pay. Sarasa suggests they gather fruitrot bee honey! But this quest isn’t entirely sweet…

10.SummaryEnglish: Iris’ father and Kate’s mother stop by for a very specific reason, but Sarasa isn’t convinced they’re telling Iris the whole story. Meanwhile, Elyn has a request for Sarasa.

11.SummaryEnglish: Sarasa has a hunch the salamander slithering around the volcano is to blame for recent events, but there’s a golden opportunity lurking in this precarious situation!

12.SummaryEnglish: Sarasa finally feels like she has a handle on her shop — but then she receives a letter that could set her down a new career path entirely. A final clash will decide it all!
